title: Papa and His Pigeon: Memoirs of A Black Seminole
description: This two-part memoir is the true story of James Madison Donald (Jim), a Black Seminole born in 1859, whose relationship with White friends set him on the road to prosperity. Jim used oral tradition to transmit family history that describes life in the Sinai Community of Florida after the Emancipation Proclamation abolished slavery.
author: Clara E. Williams
